mapper.select: select pay_price, pay_buyer,pay_seller,pay_code,product_code,pay_buyer_reviewed, pay_regDate from pay where pay_buyer=#{payBuyer} order by pay_regDate limit #{start}, 6
select pay_price, pay_buyer,pay_seller,pay_code,product_code, pay_regDate,pay_seller_reviewed from pay where pay_seller=#{paySeller} order by pay_regDate limit #{start}, 6
select count(*) from pay where pay_buyer=#{payBuyer}
select count(*) from pay where pay_seller=#{paySeller}

select month(tempMonth.temp_month) month, ifnull(sum(p.pay_price),0) payPrice
from temp_month tempMonth left join pay p on (month(p.pay_regDate) = month(tempMonth.temp_month) and p.pay_seller=#{paySeller}) group by temp_month;

select month(tempMonth.temp_month) month, ifnull(sum(p.pay_price),0) payPrice
from temp_month tempMonth left join pay p on (month(p.pay_regDate) = month(tempMonth.temp_month) and p.pay_buyer=#{payBuyer}) group by temp_month;
